about_the_game:
Slime Dungeon is an engaging 2D action-adventure slasher game that thrusts players into the heroic role of Gubby, a unique and spirited duck-like warrior with a mission to rescue the world from the clutches of nefarious slugs. The game's immersive storyline revolves around the impending threat of evil slugs and their summoners, who have cast a shadow of turmoil across the realm.

As players guide Gubby through the intricate labyrinthine passages of the Slime Dungeon, they must skillfully navigate the challenges that lie ahead. The primary objective is to locate and acquire ancient artifacts that hold the key to defeating the relentless onslaught of slugs and their malevolent creators.


Game Features
  • Unique Protagonist: Take on the role of Gubby, an unconventional yet endearing duck-like warrior, as you embark on a heroic quest to save the world from the menace of evil slugs.
  • Ancient Artifacts Quest: Explore intricate labyrinthine levels to discover and collect ancient artifacts that hold the secret to defeating the slugs and their summoners, adding an element of mystery and depth to your journey.
  • Epic Boss Battles: Test your combat skills and strategy in thrilling encounters against formidable bosses, each presenting a unique challenge that requires adaptability and tactical thinking.
  • Immersive Environments: Immerse yourself in captivating and visually striking environments, brought to life through detailed graphics, enhancing the overall atmosphere of the game.
  • Engaging Soundtrack: Immerse yourself further in the adventure with an immersive and evocative musical score, enhancing the emotional impact of the game's narrative and action sequences.

name: Slime Dungeon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 15 MB available space

short_description: Slime Dungeon: 2D action-adventure. Play as Gubby, duck warrior. Save world from evil slugs. Find artifacts, beat bosses. Unforgettable smiley-faced slime battles.
